verses.verse: When he had broke open the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.
Then I saw the seven angels who stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.

Then another angel came and stood at the altar having a gold censer. A lot of incense was given to him, so that he would offer it with the prayers of all God's people on the gold altar, which was in front of the throne.
The smoke of the incense, along with the prayers of God's people, went up in front of God from the angel's hand.
Then the angel took the censer, filled it with fire from the altar, and hurled it to the earth, then there were noises, rolling thunders, flashes of lightning, and an earthquake.
The seven angels who had the seven trumpets got ready to blow them.
Then the first angel blew his trumpet; hail and fire mixed with blood bombarded the earth. One third of the trees burned down as well as all the green grass.
The second angel blew his trumpet and something like a huge mountain flaming with fire was slammed into the sea, and a third of the sea became blood.
A third of the creatures, which were living in the sea, died, and one third of the ships were destroyed.
The third angel blew his trumpet. A huge star, flaming like a torch, fell from heaven; it fell on a third of the rivers and springs of water.
The name of that star is Wormwood, and a third of the waters became intensely bitter. Many people died from the waters, because they became intensely bitter.

The fourth angel blew his trumpet. One third of the sun was affected, so also a third of the moon and stars, so that one third of them was darkened. The day had no light for a third of it as well as the night.

Then I looked and heard an angel flying through the midst of heaven saying with a loud voice, "How horrible, horrible, horrible for the earth's inhabitants because of the rest of the sounds of the trumpets which the angels have yet to blow."
